channel.title: Project S.T.A.R.S Client Release
channel.description:
Hello guys, I'm Redfield. I'm back with a new client, and ready to blow you away with this one. The last project I did, was just a staler. It was basically a demo. A test for the Actual project. I caught a few flaws with the old one, and I realized the source I was using, offered very little. So in this one, I changed ALOT more.
I know I said I was going to make a V2, but im not. I'm going to work on a server next! :) It will probably be a figment source.
______________ Credits ______________
To Braiton from silabsoft forums. His base for chosen angels
Pur3pkftw (Also from silabforums) He gave me the codes for the green Frame.
And me. :)
Let's get started!
_____________________________________________________ PROJECT S.T.A.R.S By Redfield. _____________________________________________________
If you people saw my first client, you will know im a fan of the Resident evil series. The 'big' Police department was S.T.A.R.S. (Special Tactics and Rescue Squad.) Chris Redfield was the leader. (Hinting at my name...)
lets get to the pictures.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2vt9x6h.jpg[/img]
Some cool game frame. The colors are stars colors. Also, the inventory picture is the stars logo badge.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2zz5539.jpg[/img]
Thats the title screen. It works well with the plain white background, and the badge. Looks good eh?
________________________________ Features for the client ________________________________
Braiton had 3 songs in there. I took out all 3, and put in 1. Whoop dat trick! Instrumentals. It's a really cool beat, but if you don't like it, you can replace it.
It also use to auto connect to his server, and I changed to where it connects to you local-host IP. I really have nothing else other to say, other than enjoy! **PS-MORE PICS COMING SOON!**
I Added a Dark green Jframe. It used to be black.
~~Redfield
DL link! http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zier5oynqul

item.title: Project S.T.A.R.S Client Release
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

“LMAO! yeah right…lets see i re-did colors sprites, added new songs, made the Titleframe green, made it to where it connects to your localhost IP, I did alot more than you think I did.”

Yes i know, dragging an mp3 file into a folder is very hard. Using microsoft paint, to recolor the sprites is way too difficult, and changing what ip it connects to is way out of anybodies league, sorry i rate it -5/10

Read full topic

item.title: Project S.T.A.R.S Client Release

item.description:
@Redfield wrote:

[quote=“x power x, post:9, topic:268292”]ReColored the sprites… Editing the gameframe= Negative. The gameframe was just colored in and came like that?
And connecting the client to LocalHost (0.0.0.0., 127.0.0.1) isn’t too hard buddy![/quote]

Actually no it didnt your not one to talk who leeches everything he touches. There wasnt a gameframe It was just the plain old blue one. So instead of saying stuff you dont know, why dont you Download it and try it, before you judge it.

item.title: Project S.T.A.R.S Client Release
item.dc:creator: @Redfield Redfield
item.description:
@Redfield wrote:

The Graphics:

Wtf, that is one gross client… You call that custom? All you did is recolor the sprits?

LMAO! yeah right…lets see i re-did colors sprites, added new songs, made the Titleframe green, made it to where it connects to your localhost IP, I did alot more than you think I did.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2009, 05:21:00 pm[/size][hr][quote=“abandenzscape, post:4, topic:268292”]it looks pretty good although you really did just recolor the sprites.next client if released you should focus more on the actual.coding that’s going into the client you should look up in the tut’s how to add stuff.
RED BULL! p.s i downloaded to actually show you how to code ill send it to you soon red field RESIDENT EVIL ROCKS!

Dude when I get my cpu working right, ill show more pics of what i actually did. This is more advanced than you think.

[/quote]

Read full topic

@Redfield wrote:

Hello guys, I’m Redfield. I’m back with a new client, and ready to blow you away with this one. The last project I did, was just a staler. It was basically a demo. A test for the Actual project. PROJECT S.T.A.R.S By Redfield.
